ygData.subject: Unrest - progress report
ygData.msgSnippet: Or more correctly Regress Report... Died 3 times last night and lost half the xp gained since going in there. Chalk it up to learning how to fight there. First
ygData.messageBody:
Or more correctly Regress Report...

Died 3 times last night and lost half the xp gained since going in there.
Chalk it up to learning how to fight there.

First dedth: a bad pull early in the nite and we dint break off and run.
Stood there til we died heroically fighting too many mobs at one time but
still ded. Memmed in Lullaby - AE or not we will see how it works here. It
worked real well on the next couple multi-mob situations. Now how to get
these 17,18,19 lev tanks to attack the same mob and not each try to fight
their own. Even so I was nodding 3 ghouls and a lurking mummy while they
whacked down the 2 dry bones.

Second dedth: a bad train bounced us as we were in combat - we were pulling
to the wall from the back room and a skel monk and his dbs pals got behind
us while we were fighting ghouls. It happens - like a bad roll. Gotta keep
watchin more.

Third dedth: a bad idea. Well, the Lullaby worked so well lets try Denon's
and a horn. I bet I can stand here near the tunnel entrance (solo) and kill
off several dedth beetles while doing damage to dry and dark bones these
guys are pulling off trains. Oh yeah looking real good - that skellie is
really in a world of hurt - I bet next tick or two and ill get the kill.
Hmm where is the next update? Am I lagging? wtf?? Only a sliver of hp???
Ru.....Loading, Please Wait...

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 22st song
Selling Swords and Such
somewhere on Innoruuk
